name: Hermes Growth Partners
overview:
Hermes Growth Partners (“HGP”) is a private equity firm that focuses on growth-stage companies in the telecom, media and technology (“TMT”) sectors globally. The firm’s primary objective is to help high-potential companies drive growth to create value. The firm is the exclusive advisor for the Canepa Global TMT Fund, seeking to invest $10m-$50m into each situation.

HGP brings a combination of long-term capital, extensive operational management skills and financial asset management experience to each situation. As such HGP views itself more as a strategic partner than a purely financial investor and will only consider situations where there is an opportunity to drive growth through its active involvement.

HGP has several ways in which it helps companies drive growth, including placing key members of the management team, acting as advisors to the existing management team, and investing in a company via another investment to accelerate both companies’ trajectories.

HGP’s profile attracts companies and investors who seek TMT expertise alongside long-term capital. Consequently, HGP is often offered opportunities on an exclusive or restricted basis. Current investments include the groundbreaking MVNO Virgin Mobile Latin America; Sunbay A.G., a Swiss software company which has a state-of-the-art solution for data compression, security and control across telco and enterprise data networks; and RingCentral in California, the pre-eminent cloud-based PBX solution for SMEs.
